Author: ropiku
Content: You can protect you repository with apache http authorization. Just search for a tutorial, here's what I found: http://svn.spears.at/#3.2 You add the users/passwords with htpasswd and then in httpd.conf add Auth entries.

Author: brianr
Content: $13 is an unbeatable price for a 4x8 sheet of whiteboard... do you have any complaints with it so far? Does it write and erase OK?

Author: herdrick
Content:
He's right to want this; it's great in DrScheme. I can't stand typing out l-a-m-b-d-a anymore. Just cntrl-\ and you've got it.

"Lambda expressions are rarely useful in Python." Sad but probably true. In my limited experience with Python you are steered away from lambdas.
